item.title: About Delta Sec
item.description: Delta Sec is a consulting company that offers services in the areas of Information Security, Privacy and Security Awareness Training. The company was established by Dimitrios Stergiou who has over 20 years of experience in roles that cover IT Security, Information Security, Privacy and Awareness Training. Dimitrios has held roles such as: Information Security Engineer Information Security Consultant Information Security Manager Chief Information Security Officer Dimitrios currently holds the following certifications:
